text: Silvery Dust () is a 1953 Soviet drama movie directed by Abram Room.СЕРЕБРИСТАЯ ПЫЛЬСеребристая пыль (1953) It stars Mikhail Bolduman, Sofiya Pilyavskaya, and Valentina Ushakova. ==Actors== * Mikhail Bolduman as Samuel Steal * Sofiya Pilyavskaya as Doris Steal * Valentina Ushakova as Jen O'Connel * Nikolai Timofeyev as Allan O'Connel * Vsevolod Larionov as Harry Steal * Vladimir Belokurov as Upton Bruce == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Abram Room
title: Silvery Dust
